content: Parklife是一个独立的音乐节，每年在英国曼彻斯特举行，由Sacha Lord共同创办。它开始时是在拉什尔姆的普拉特菲尔德公园举办的Mad Ferret Festival，然后在2013年搬到了曼彻斯特北部的希顿公园，以适应参加人数的增加。它是由一些团体共同组织的，包括The Warehouse Project和Live Nation。这个音乐节是一个为期两天的非露营节。2019年，它的容量为15000人，然而2021年的音乐节据说可以容纳80000人。
contentEn: Parklife is an independent music festival held annually in Manchester, England, co-founded by Sacha Lord. It started life as Mad Ferret Festival in Platt Fields Park, Rusholme, before moving to Heaton Park in north Manchester in 2013 in order to accommodate the increased numbers attending. It is jointly organised by a number of groups, including The Warehouse Project and Live Nation. This music festival is a two-day non-camping festival. In 2019 it had a capacity of 15,000, however the 2021 festival is stated to accommodate 80,000.
remarks:
